SELECT -1*(difference(last("value"))) FROM /interface\..*\.rxBytes/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM /interface\..*\.txBytes/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT -1*(difference(last("value"))) FROM /interface\..*\.rxPackets/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM /interface\..*\.txPackets/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT difference(last("value")) FROM /interface\..*\.??Errors/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.description: The number of read and write requests that were issued to the device per second.

targets.query: SELECT -1*(last("value")) FROM /iostat\..*\.w_per_s/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM /iostat\..*\.r_per_s/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Read e Write Requests

targets.query: SELECT -1*(last("value")) FROM /iostat\..*\.wkB_per_s/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM /iostat\..*\.rkB_per_s/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.description: it shows the number of operations that were either queued or being serviced

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM /iostat\.[sv]d[a-z]\.avgqu-sz/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Queue average concurrency overall size

panels.description: The average time for I/O requests issued to the device to be served. This includes the time spent by the requests in queue and the time spent servicing them.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM /iostat\..*\.await/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

panels.title: Average Time for I/O Response
